name: Cosmic Weather
author: Lumia Stream
description: Streams neon-drenched weather reports with shimmering animations.
longDescription: A playful sample plugin that pulls real weather data, remixes it with synthwave flair, and demonstrates how to bundle third-party npm packages inside a Lumia plugin.

settings.label: State / Region
settings.helperText: Optional: narrow the geocoding to a specific state or region.

settings.label: Auto Forecast Interval (minutes)
settings.helperText: Set to a value greater than 0 to schedule recurring synthwave forecasts.

settings.label: Weather API Key
settings.helperText: Optional: provide an OpenWeather-style API key to fetch live data.

actions.label: Trigger Forecast
actions.description: Push a fresh synthwave forecast to Lumia

alerts.title: Synthwave Forecast
alerts.info: Plays when a a major weather change is detected. For example, from sunny to cloudy, or from clear to rain.
